official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the operations of the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality during fiscal years 1987, 1988, and 1989.

summary.text: Amends the Environmental Quality Improvement Act of 1970 to authorize appropriations for FY 1987 through 1989 for the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the operations of the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality during fiscal years 1987, 1988, and 1989.
